column4: Is there any command to jump to the previous directory? For instance, when I'm in /home/chris/dir1/dir2/dir3 and type "cd", so I get to my home directory /home/chris. Is there any command to get back to /home/chris/dir1/dir2/dir3 ? I know that Sun provides a command called "back" for this purpose
with cd .. I get to the undelying directory.
maybe I used "crevious" in a confusing way
